news.title: Madra Salach, Calum Agnew, The Donnys and The Wu join lineup for Electric Picnic’s ArtLot Area
news.summary: A new micro dance venue Seomra Boil has also been added to the area

news.title: Arthur Baker: "I’ve been asked about ‘Planet Rock’ probably more than anything I’ve ever done"
news.summary: Legendary producer and remixer Arthur Baker discusses his riveting new memoir Looking For The Perfect Beat, in which he reflects on working with the legendary likes of The Rolling Stones, Bob Dylan and New Order.

news.title: An estimated 800,000 people attended this year's Fleadh in Wexford
news.summary: The 2026 Fleadh Cheoil will take place in Belfast

news.title: Neven Maguire, Jonny Murphy and JP McMahon among lineup for Electric Picnic's Theatre of Food
news.summary: The Theatre of Food is retuning for its seventeenth year in 2025.

news.title: Autumnal Blooms series to run five intimate gigs in Tullamore featuring Tolü Makay, Daoirí Farrell, Liam Ó Maonlaí
news.summary: Other performers include Liam Ó Maonlaí of Hothouse Flowers, Rónán Ó Snodaigh of Kíla, Zkellies, Frank and Walters Acoustic and more.

news.title: Oasis in '08: "When we’re on fucking form, we’ll roast any band past and present – all on the same day"
news.summary: Ahead of Oasis’s sold-out Croke Park shows on August 16 & 17, we’re taking a deep-dive into the Hot Press archives – to hear Liam and Noel's incredible story in their own words...

news.title: Sorry announce new album Cosplay
news.summary: Check out the new video for their latest single ‘Echoes’ below

news.title: Mick Flannery and Susan O'Neill announce In The Game - Live 2021-2025
news.summary: The live album is available to pre-order now.
